name: editAV
short_description:
editAV supports simple video stream editing and enhancement.  A selected segment within a stream may be saved or deleted.

Frame-by-frame enhancements--such as noise reduction, sharpening, brightness and contrast improvements, lens distortion removal and rotations are supported.

Currently, editAV runs on Linux only, and processes only AVI video files.  A script using ffmpeg is offered which converts MPEG4 files to AVI files.

Future enhancements will likely include Windows and native MPEG4 support.
summary: editAV is a simple video editor supporting frame by frame enhancement.
